credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Birdcage
description: Glazed earthenware frame (a), rectangular with arched top and simple short square feet; vertical metal wires set into frame.  White ground with blue glaze deocration of geometrical designs along ceramic cross posts and corners; bottom section comprising panels decorated with landscapes, including boating scene on front panel, ice skaters on rear panel.  Removeable ceramic drawer (b), with central metal knob, slides into lower right corner of cage.
name: Birdcage
